main event: The observer sighted a 'sharp fire type light' in Tucson, Arizona on August 10, 1968. After about 5 minutes, the light went out.
interesting points: The object was described as a long, cylinder-shaped object about the size of a jet aircraft, orange-red in color like fire.
The object was observed traveling at around 220 mph and 2,000 to 5,000 feet high, burning out about 15 miles south of Tucson.
The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.
The witness was at the Prince Drive-In Theater in Tucson when the sighting occurred.
No aircraft were reported operating in the area at the time of the sighting, and no balloon releases were known.
sighted object: a long, cylinder-shaped object with an orange-red, fire-like appearance
